metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20726 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in host.php (viatree.php) in Cacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintendedcharacters in the Website Hostname field for Devices.

criterions.comment: cacti: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
